text: kalin ekata riplayi nokara hitiye hethuwak athuwa...

2600 sambuddha jayanthiya nimithikotagena bhikshun wahansela sandaha wishesha ingrisi puhunu patamalawak aarambha kirimata katayuthu yoda atha.singappuruwe jathyanthara bauddha sanwidhanaya samaga mema wadasatahana meheyawanu labanne ambailipitiya shri bodhiraja padanama magini.2011.05.23 dina pa.wa. 1.00 ta ema bhikshun wahansela sandaha sammukha parikshanayak kaduwela ihala bomiriye anka 112 darana sthanaye pihiti shri bodhiraja padanamata ayath kamboja bhikshu newasikagara karyalayedi pawathwimata niyamithaya.singappuruwe bauddha wiharaye sthanadhipathi pujya galle udhitha nayaka swamin wahanse athulu pradhana widwath mandalayak magin mema sammukha parikshanaya pawathwena athara ehi anushasakathwaya daranu labanne pujya panditha oomalpe sobhitha swaminwahanse wisini.mulika ingrisi danuma athi a.po.sa.pa. (samanya pela) ho piriwen awasan wibhagaya samath bhikshunwahansela sandaha mema wishesha puhunu wadasatahana pawathwena athara ee sandaha idiripathwana lesa adala bhikshun wahanselata aaradhanaya karana baw sanwidhayaka mandalaya danwa siti..

ohu langa thibune dipendar wargaye rathayaki.me sakakariya saha sakakaru da panadura mahesthrath adhikaranaya wetha idiripatha kala panadura polisiye wishesha wancha saha aparadha anshaye sthanadhipathi polis parikshaka gikiyanage mahatha parikshana warthawa da adhikaranaya wetha idiripath kaleya.ema warthawa salaka balu mahesthrath aar. es. ee. disanayaka mahatha rupiyal laksha 20 bagin sharira apa niyama kara sakakariya saha sakakaru muda hariye ya.
ema nisa kawuru monawa kiwath ema ka්rikat ka්ridakaya thama daruwa suwapath kale ema aagamen yayi wishwasa kaleya.

gomarankadawala pradeshiya sabhawe 2014 mudal warshaya sandaha ema pradeshiya sabhawe sabhapathi el.bi.chandana wijithakumara mahatha idiripath karanu labu aya-waya wadi janda pahakin sabha sammatha wuha.eksath janatha nidahas sandhanayata balaya himi gomarankadawala pradeshiya sabhawe aya-waya idiripath karana awasthawe ehi upa sabhapathini neranjala sarojani mahathmiya pamina nositi athara palaka pakshaye manthriwaru hayadeneku sabha garbhaye sitiyaha.aya-waya sandaha chanda wimasimedi wipakshaya niyojanaya karana ekama manthriwaraya aya-wayata wiruddhawa chandaya prakasha kalaha..
